section.title: configuration of products module Configure Products
section.para: To configure the Products module, go to Products > Setup > Configure > Products. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the Products module, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to enable the system's item transformation capability. If not selected, users will be prevented from performing tasks related to item transformations.

Select to enable the revision control system. If selected, privileged users will be able to maintain revisions for bills of material (BOM) and operations. Revisions may also be used in manufacturing and purchasing processes.

varlistentry.term: Post Item Changes to the Change Log

listitem.para: Select to post to the change log any changes made to Item masters.

varlistentry.term: Allow Inactive Items to be Added to BOMs

listitem.para: Select to allow inactive items to be added to BOMs.

varlistentry.term: Allow deletion of Items from Bill of Material

listitem.para: Select if you want to globally allow users to delete items from BOMs. The Delete option will be found in the right-click menu on the BOM header screen. If you do not select this option, users will be able to expire but not delete BOM items.

varlistentry.term: Start Item Search when no results found

listitem.para: Select if you want an Item Search window to open during sales order entry if users are entering item numbers but not finding any exact matches.
Specify preferences for the following defaults:

varlistentry.term: Set Sold Items as exclusive as default configuration Exclusive

listitem.para: Select to mark all sold items as exclusive by default whenever a new item is created.
Select one of the available default issue methods.
Select to issue materials to a work order by a specific material issue transaction.
Select to issue materials to a work order by a material backflush.
Select to issue materials to a work order based on the issue method applied to the materials initiallyâ€”that is, either pull or push.

tip.para: bills of materials deleting items from The default settings Set Sold Items as Exclusive and W/O Material Issue Method only apply to newly-created items. They cannot be used to retroactively update already existing items.

listitem.para: Select to enable work center routings. De-select to disable routings.
If work center routings are enabled, select one of the following methods for tracking machine overhead:

Select to track machine overhead separately from other overhead costs, using the machine overhead rate specified in a Work Center master. Any associated costs will display in the system-defined machine overhead costing element.
Select to track machine overhead in the same category as other overhead costs. Any associated costs will display in the system-defined overhead costing element. (This is the default setting.)
Select to enable the system's breeder BOM capability. If not selected, users will be prevented from entering breeder BOMs or performing any tasks related to posting production for breeder BOMs, etc.

varlistentry.term: Change BOM/Routing Active revision to Substitute when activating a Pending revision

listitem.para: Select to keep deactivated revisions as Substitutes on routings and BOM. If not selected, deactivated revisions will not be available for future use.
